page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN ABERDOUR AREA
page.content: Most of the people who live in our area work in{Edinburgh}and quite a few work locally.In a street survey in {Dalgety Bay}and{Aberdour}we found that {34%}of people worked in{Edinburgh.19% worked locally at{Hillend}or near {Aberdour. 9%}worked away from home and {37%}worked in places such as {Glasgow,Perth}and{Stirling}etc.We also tried to find out what kind of jobs people had.{38%}worked in an office of some sort.{31%}were engineers.{16% were salesmen and{16%}did other jobs such as the{Armed Forces}or{Taxi {Drivers.}We then asked women if they had jobs or were housewives.{22% worked full time and{28%}part time.So the other{50%}are housewives.
